TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Region extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Represents a visual region in a Xamarin.Forms UI.

remarks.para: Currently, regions represent rectangles, or collections of rectangles, only.

Docs.returns: A region shrunk by the values in the most recent inflation, or does nothing if there has not been a previous inflation.

The width of a line that spans the rectangle that encloses the region.

Docs.summary: Creates and returns a region that detects points inside a collection of rectangles created from the lines that are specified by the provided data.
Docs.returns: A region that detects points inside a collection of rectangles created from the lines that are specified by the provided data.
